mapper.select: select b.id id, b.blog_title blogTitle, b.logo_file logoFile, u.user_name userName from users u, blog b where b.id = u.id and b.id = #{id}

select c.cate_no cateNo, cate_name cateName, description, nvl(p.cnt,0) postCnt from category c, (select cate_no, count(*) cnt from post group by cate_no)p where c.cate_no = p.cate_no(+) and id = #{id} order by c.cate_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into post values( seq_post_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, sysdate )

select seq_category_no.nextval from dual
insert into category values( #{cateNo}, #{id}, #{cateName}, #{description}, sysdate )
